transcript: I got asked to speak at this like personal trainer conference and he's like yeah I blocked 4 hours for you that's a lot I had such a long speaking slot that I was like well I'm not going to pitch for 4 hours I I made this really long presentation that was just like very very good on Fitness sales and marketing all that kind of stuff at the end I was like yeah and here's the prize and I dropped it and so I did what would have been a 90-minute presentation pitch in like 15 minutes after giving 3 hours plus of value and I got so much resistance from the crowd I think I made two sales like it was nothing the moral of the story though I had done a half measure and so it's either sell or don't so
